TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_dadipasan, title = dadipasan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/dadipasan} }

S.FORM: dadipasan 海邊,海岸,沙灘 sapuelac u dadipasan sa, u saedipan nu bayu'. matulin nu bayu' atu tukus . si laying ,mulenu atu malac saca makelah ,bayu'-likit i sadipasan . u kakuniza nu tuud sa, izaw ku baetu-dadipasan atu bunak-dadipasan . anu u talakaway nu tukus a kakuniza sa, izaw ku celem-dadipasan atu laliyas-dadipasan . celem-dadipasan sa, u macelem tasasa' ku tukus. anu laliyas-dadipasan sa, mahmuwas ku lala' nay labu' nu bayu'. bangcal ku dadipasan, katuud ku tademaw tayza i dadipasan misalama' mibalakas. maydih ku tademaw tayza dadipasan mingaduy . katuud ku midangay a tademaw i dadipasan. i Kalingku saca sawaliyan , bangbangcal ku dadipasan. i Kalingkuay a dadipasan sa, izaw ku sibunacay, izaw ku sibaetuay. yadah ku lalacan atu piya'. maydih ku Yincumin tayza i bayu', miala tu kakaenan nu bayu'ay. sadipasan , bayu' namakayniyan a nasulitan nasakamuwan atu natinengan Wikipayke paybalucu'ay pulungamin a cudad-岸 nasulitan nay paybalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018-1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun Taywan Sakizaya putiput i Youtube-dadipasan nakulitan ni Yiyang Sayun一個人看海

dadipasan 海邊,海岸,沙灘 sapoelac o dadipasan sa, o saedipan no bayo'. matolin no bayo' ato tokos . si laying ,moleno ato malac saca makelah ,bayo'-likit i sadipasan . o kakoniza no tood sa, izaw ko baeto-dadipasan ato bonak-dadipasan . ano o talakaway no tokos a kakoniza sa, izaw ko celem-dadipasan ato laliyas-dadipasan . celem-dadipasan sa, o macelem tasasa' ko tokos. ano laliyas-dadipasan sa, mahmowas ko lala' nay labo' no bayo'. bangcal ko dadipasan, katood ko tademaw tayza i dadipasan misalama' mibalakas. maydih ko tademaw tayza dadipasan mingadoy . katood ko midangay a tademaw i dadipasan. i Kalingko saca sawaliyan , bangbangcal ko dadipasan. i Kalingkoay a dadipasan sa, izaw ko sibonacay, izaw ko sibaetoay. yadah ko lalacan ato piya'. maydih ko Yincomin tayza i bayo', miala to kakaenan no bayo'ay. sadipasan , bayo' namakayniyan a nasolitan nasakamowan ato natinengan Wikipayke paybaloco'ay polongamin a codad-岸 nasolitan nay paybaloco'ay a kawaw no sobana'ay a po 2018-1, nasolitan ni Toko Sayon Taywan Sakizaya potipot i Yootobe-dadipasan nakolitan ni Yiyang Sayon一個人看海
